name: milly cheri
notes:
a b o u t d e s i g n
milly cheri bandana is a little kerchief that can be worn in multiple ways. it is a perfect gift and can be a
lovely shawl for a little girl.
milly cheri was designed with those odd balls and leftover skeins of fingering weight yarn and mohair
we all have in our stashes, but the shawl can also be worked in a single strand of dk weight yarn.
with this pattern, you can adapt your own design and knit a long scarf if desire in repeating charts as you
want.

y a r n

knitting for olive
one strand of merino held with one strand of
soft silk mohair (cream col.)
1 ball of each

circular needle 4 mm with a cable of at least 60cm

n o t i o n s
2 stitch markers
1 tapestry needle
1 sewing needle
1 cable needle
some markers if you need to separate your work for each motif.

----

free patterns are for personal use only. no help will be provide.

thank you for your understanding.

les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement.
aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations,

merci de votre compréhension.
